feed.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?

entry.title: Dedicated server for bitcoin.org, your thoughts?
entry.summary: The sender of the email offers server hardware and colocation for dedicated 50Mbit in 55 S. Market, San Jose, CA data center. However, the sender cannot commit to providing more bandwidth than this at present. The email thread discusses the control over the bitcoin.org domain, with suggestions that multiple people should have control in case of unexpected events. The idea of separating bitcoin.org from Github is also raised, with the suggestion that a sponsor could be found for a dedicated server if needed. The need for SSL is acknowledged.
